column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////HI Diana - Thanks for the 5 stars. You're awesome
column2: and we appreciate your super-kind words. We also thank you for sticking out the wait. By this time next year
column3: there will be 4 JINYA outposts all around Houston
column4: which hopefully will alleviate some of these crowds -- at least
column5: that's one of the goals. But more importantly
column6: thank you for the high marks
column7: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
